title: River Flows In You
lyrics: If you have the time to share the road with me If you can imagin we could both be free, What I long to do is give my heart to you So that you can always hold it close to you Holding you, holding you The river flows in you Slowly now, slowly now The river flows in you If you have the time to share the road with me If you can imagin we could both be free, Holding you, holding you The river flows in you Slowly now, slowly now The river flows in you If you have the time to share the road with me If you can imagin we could both be free, What I long to do is give my heart to you So that you can always hold it close to you
